resources.string: Swipe left or right to change the selected poker card. Adjust the card deck style in the top right option menu.

In planning poker, members of the group make estimates by playing numbered cards face-down to the table, instead of speaking them aloud. The cards are revealed, and the estimates are then discussed. \n— Wikipedia
